name: WebHost Egg
author: info@djfinn.nl
description:
Introducing a versatile hosting solution for any website!

With built-in Composer support, simply specify the packages you need in the “Packages” box, and they’ll be installed automatically when the server starts. Want to set up WordPress? Just toggle the WordPress slider during server setup, and WordPress will be ready to go in moments.

© Sigma Productions 2025

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

# Set working directory
cd /mnt/server || exit 1
apk --update add git unzip curl || { echo "Failed to install Git and required packages"; exit 1; }

# Clone the repository containing nginx and php configurations
if git clone https://github.com/Sigma-Production/ptero-eggs ./temp; then
    cp -r ./temp/nginx ./temp/php-fpm ./temp/webroot /mnt/server/
    cp ./temp/start.sh /mnt/server/
    chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh
    rm -rf ./temp
else
    echo "Failed to clone repository"; exit 1
fi

# Prepare directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server/tmp /mnt/server/logs

# WordPress installation
if [ "${WORDPRESS}" = "true" ] || [ "${WORDPRESS}" = "1" ]; then
    echo "Installing WordPress..."
    cd /mnt/server/webroot || exit 1
    if wget -q https://wordpress.org/latest.zip; then
        unzip latest.zip && mv wordpress/* . && rm -rf wordpress latest.zip
        echo "WordPress installation complete. Visit http://ip:port/wp-admin"
    else
        echo "Failed to download WordPress"; exit 1
    fi
    exit 0
fi

# NamelessMC installation
if [ "${NAMELESSMC}" = "true" ] || [ "${NAMELESSMC}" = "1" ]; then
    echo "Installing NamelessMC..."
    cd /mnt/server/webroot || exit 1
    curl -L "https://github.com/NamelessMC/Nameless/releases/latest/download/nameless-deps-dist.tar.xz" | \
        tar -xJ -C /mnt/server/webroot || { echo "Failed to download or extract NamelessMC"; exit 1; }

    # Configure Nginx for NamelessMC
    echo "Configuring Nginx for NamelessMC..."
    cd /mnt/server/nginx/conf.d || { echo "Failed to navigate to Nginx configuration directory"; exit 1; }
    rm -f default.conf  # Remove the default configuration file if it exists
    curl -LO https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sigma-Production/ptero-eggs/NamelessMC/nginx/conf.d/default.conf || { echo "Failed to download Nginx configuration"; exit 1; }
    
    echo "NamelessMC installation and configuration completed."
    exit 0
fi

# Check for user-uploaded content
if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" = "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" = "1" ]; then
    echo "User upload enabled. Assuming custom setup."
    exit 0
fi

# Configure Git repository if provided
cd /mnt/server/webroot || exit 1

# Ensure .git extension for GIT_ADDRESS
[ "${GIT_ADDRESS##*.}" != "git" ] && GIT_ADDRESS="${GIT_ADDRESS}.git"

# Authenticate if username and access token are provided
if [ -n "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -n "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@${GIT_ADDRESS#https://}"
fi

# Handle Git repository cloning or updating
if [ -n "$(ls -A /mnt/server/webroot 2>/dev/null)" ]; then
    echo "/mnt/server/webroot directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ] && [ -f .git/config ]; then
        ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        if [ "${ORIGIN}" = "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
            echo "Pulling latest changes from GitHub"
            git pull || { echo "Git pull failed"; exit 1; }
        else
            echo "Different Git origin detected; skipping pull to avoid conflicts."
        fi
    else
        echo "Directory contains files without a Git configuration."
        exit 10
    fi
else
    echo "/mnt/server/webroot is empty. Cloning repository..."
    if [ -n "${BRANCH}" ]; then
        echo "Cloning branch ${BRANCH}"
        git clone --single-branch --branch "${BRANCH}" "${GIT_ADDRESS}" .
    else
        echo "Cloning default branch"
        git clone "${GIT_ADDRESS}" .
    fi
fi

echo "Installation complete. Visit http://ip:port/"

Enable or disable Wordpress

1 = true

you can always add packages later..

variables.name: Git Branch

What branch to pull from github.

Default is blank to pull the repo default branch
